present_tense.continuous: I am currently writing a report.
present_tense.perfect: I have completed my tasks for the day.
present_tense.perfect_continuous: I have been working on this project for weeks.

past_tense.simple: Yesterday, I wrote a detailed email.
past_tense.continuous: During the meeting, I was discussing the project progress.
past_tense.perfect: By the time I arrived, they had already finished the presentation.
past_tense.perfect_continuous: Before the event, they had been rehearsing their performance.

future_tense.simple: Tomorrow, I will submit the final report.
future_tense.continuous: Next week, I will be attending a conference.
future_tense.perfect: By this time next year, I will have completed my certification.
future_tense.perfect_continuous: In five years, I will have been working in this industry for a decade.

noun.definition: A word that represents a person, place, thing, or idea.

pronoun.definition: A word used to replace a noun to avoid repetition.
pronoun.example: She is going to the park.

verb.definition: A word that expresses an action, occurrence, or state of being.
verb.example: They are singing in the choir.

adjective.definition: A word that describes or modifies a noun.

adverb.definition: A word that modifies a verb, adjective, or other adverb, indicating time, manner, place, etc.

preposition.definition: A word that shows the relationship of a noun or pronoun to another word.
preposition.example: The book is on the table.

conjunction.definition: A word that connects words, phrases, or clauses.
conjunction.example: She likes both chocolate and vanilla ice cream.

interjection.definition: A word or phrase used to express strong feeling or surprise.

male.definition: A gender identity that typically corresponds with being assigned male at birth.

female.definition: A gender identity that typically corresponds with being assigned female at birth.

non_binary.definition: A gender identity that doesn't exclusively align with male or female, often encompassing a range of identities.
non_binary.example: They are an advocate for non-binary rights.

transgender.definition: A gender identity that differs from the sex assigned at birth, often transitioning to align with their true identity.
transgender.example: She is a transgender woman who advocates for inclusivity.
